Package io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.configuration

Interface IAuthTokenStorage

All Superinterfaces:
Provider<IAuthTokenModel>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AuthTokenMemoryStorage, AuthTokenStorageWrapperWithRefresh
public interface IAuthTokenStorage extends Provider<IAuthTokenModel>
Provides OAuth access token data to authenticate to the Smint.io RESTful API.

It is vital for the synchronization job to have proper OAuth data available. This is not the case right at the beginning and OAuth access token must be created with user interaction. In the end new authorization data will be stored utilizing the store function storeAuthData(IAuthTokenModel). But how does the rest of the system get notified about it? It is highly asynchronous as it involves external systems (user browser) to accept the authorization request.

    get

  • Method Details

    • getAuthData

      IAuthTokenModel getAuthData()
      Provides the OAuth authentication data to authorize access to Smint.io API.
      Returns:
      Currently valid OAuth data or null if none is available.

    • storeAuthData

      IAuthTokenStorage storeAuthData(IAuthTokenModel newAuthTokenData)
      Stores a new set of OAuth authentication data to be made persistent and retrieved on next call to getAuthData().

      The access token should be persisted to the underlying storage. In case this storage takes a lot of IO and time (eg: database), please make use of CompletableFuture.runAsync(Runnable) and then return this on completion.

      Parameters:
      newAuthTokenData - new OAuth token data for authorization with Smint.io API server, that need to be made persistent.
      Returns:
      this to support Fluent Interface.
